original_title: Nightwish: From Wishes to Eternity - Live
overview: Live concert by Finnish symphonic metal band Nightwish. It was recorded in Tampere, Finland on 29 December 2000.  Setlist: 1. The Kinslayer / 2. She Is My Sin / 3. Deep Silent Complete / 4. The Pharaoh Sails to Orion / 5. Come Cover Me / 6. Wanderlust / 7. Instrumental (Crimson Tide/Deep Blue Sea) / 8. Swanheart / 9. Elvenpath / 10. FantasMic (Part 3) / 11. Dead Boy's Poem / 12. Sacrament of Wilderness / 13. Walking in the Air / 14. Beauty & the Beast / 15. Wishmaster.
title: Nightwish: From Wishes to Eternity - Live
